ygData.subject: Selling Shovel, more advice needed
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I had the pleasure of someone making me an offer for my shovel, The problem is he was very pushy and didn t not give me a chance to think about it.
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I had the pleasure of someone making me an
offer for my shovel, The problem is he was very pushy
and didn't not give me a chance to think about it.

He offered me 30PP for it and some dagger. Told me I
couldn't use it to its fullest. I am a level 3 Druid
halfling. It is a wee harvester and I can't remember
its stats and such but my question is should I have
sold it because I didn't.? I kept it. It is magical
and makes food for me.

Someone else also told me to buy my level 1 and level
5 spells. I take it there are no level 2,3,4? Should
I look for the spells in this order
Buff
Heal
Str
Combat

Thanks again, You all have been very helpful

Rob
